item.description:
It's always Springtime at The Butterfly Place! When you are ready for Spring and warm weather, and long to see colorful flowers with butterflies fluttering about, it's time for a visit to The Butterfly Place!

The Butterfly Place is an indoor living environment which has been carefully designed for the propagation and development of some of nature's most colorful living creations. This wonderful man-made habitat is contained within a 3,100 sq. ft. glass atrium building towering to a height of over 27 ft. at its peak. Within this atrium?s living butterfly environment can be found a variety of colorful plants and shrubs, each of which has been selected as a source of nectar for the butterflies. ( taken from their website)

The entry fee is $9.00. Welcome Spring!
I believe there are coupon savings available through The Entertainment Book?
but am not sure of the amount

NOTE: This is truly a serene, peaceful and beautiful environment. Do you draw? Bring your sketchbook...Into photography? Excellent for photos! I have also posted
this on other meetup group sites. After, we can head out for an early afternoon
lunch or snack at an area restaurant. We can either decide that afternoon? Or,
decide on it in advance.
item.name: Springtime @ The Butterfly Place
